unit_learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate knowledge of students and how they learn.
Demonstrate sound knowledge of the K-6 curriculum and how to teach it.
Create and maintain a safe learning environment.
Plan and implement effective teaching strategies.

enrolment_rules.description: (Admission to BEd(Prim) and (EDUC258 or EDUC2580) and (EDUC260 or EDUC2600) and (EDUC267 or EDUC2670)) or (130cp including (EDUC258 or EDUC2580) and (EDUC260 or EDUC2600) and (EDUC267 or EDUC2670) and (EDTE353 or EDTE3530))

assessments.description: Report by the Supervising Teacher on the performance of the student against AITSL Standards

data.subject_search_title: EDTE3010 - Professional Experience in the Primary School 1
data.description: The initial Professional Experience unit for intending primary school teachers. Students are required to work in a school for at least 20 days under the guidance of a Supervising Teacher implementing the strategies and techniques being developed concurrently in the 300-level primary methodology units.
